content:
广州市特威工程机械有限公司自2011创建以来，一直秉承着“成为世界上著名的施工升降机制造公司之一”的企业目标，全身心致力于研发、生产制造施工升降机设备，在业内以品质可靠、满足用户要求、经验丰富而著称。广州市特威工程机械有限公司是新五丰钢业旗下公司之一，地处广州市白云区神山镇、拥有焊接、折弯、车、钻、成型等生产配套设备与检测调试设备、可生产研发性能先进、安全可靠的施工升降机，竭诚以提供良好的服务，合理的价格和准时的交货，全员参与持续提高产品质量，为广大顾客提供性能卓越的产品与满意的服务。

Established in 2011 ,Guagzhou tewei engineering Machinery Co.,Ltd sticks to the goal of “becoming one of the famous building hoist manufacturers in the world “.Fully committed to development ,manufacture of building hoists ,TW is famous for good quality .rich experience ,to meet the needs of customers .Located in shenshan towm,Bai Yun District ,Guangzhou City ,it is subsidiary of Xin Wu Feng Steel Company,we have support and testing equipment ofwelding ,bending ,machining ,drilling and shaping ,which help to manufacture ,develop advanced .safe and reliable building hoists ,All the members of our company will be devoted to improving the product quality .providing good performance of products ,and satisfied service.

地址：广州市白云区神山镇五丰工业大道318号

Add: No138 Wufeng Industrial Ave , Shenshan Town, Baiyun Dis, Guangzhou.

电话：020-36711962 36711906
